citation: Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 52A of the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 –

        (a) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1985, No. 228 by omitting Schedule 2 to that proclamation and substituting the following Schedule:
        SCHEDULE 2 – PLACES OF ACCESS  Places of access  Column 1  Column 2  Places of access  Distance in kilometres from the northern boundary of Cormiston Road, North Riverside  1. Danbury Drive - south west side  2.16  2. Danbury Drive - south west side  3.10  3. Acropolis Drive - south west side  3.54  4. Legana Park Drive - north east side  4.00  5. Bridgenorth Road - south west side  4.71  6. Fulton Street - north east side  4.95  7. Freshwater Point Road - north east side  5.48  8. Sunrise Drive - south west side  5.49  9. Muddy Creek Road - south west side  5.95  10. Bindaree Road - north east side  6.03
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
        
            (b) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
    13 November 2000

    G. S. M. GREEN

    Governor

    By His Excellency's Command,

    P. A. LENNON

    Minister for Infrastructure, Energy and Resources

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 22 November 2000

    This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
